meanings.definition: To remove paint from a surface.
meanings.sent1: I am depainting the old chair to give it a fresh look.
meanings.sent2: She carefully depainted the walls before applying a new coat of paint.
meanings.sent3: The depainting process revealed a hidden layer of vibrant colors underneath.
meanings.sent4: Depainting the fence felt like uncovering a forgotten piece of history.
meanings.sent5: The artist's skillful depainting technique transformed the canvas completely.

meanings.definition: The act of stripping paint from an object.
meanings.sent1: The depainting of the antique dresser revealed intricate woodwork underneath.
meanings.sent2: Depainting can be a time-consuming task, but the results are worth it.
meanings.sent3: The depainting of the statue made it look like it was blushing.
meanings.sent4: The depainting of the car exposed the metal surface to the elements.
meanings.sent5: The depainting of the house was a messy but necessary job to prepare for repainting.
